name: Partially hydrolyzed (40-50%) polyvinyl alcohol, modified with up to 2 percent by weight crotonic acid (i.e. a terpolymer of vinyl acetate, vinyl alcohol and crotonic acid).
FoodContactSubstance: Partially hydrolyzed (40-50%) polyvinyl alcohol, modified with up to 2 percent by weight crotonic acid (i.e. a terpolymer of vinyl acetate, vinyl alcohol and crotonic acid).
